title: Apple Bowls
alt: Two apple-shaped stoneware bowls with a drippy red-green glaze

title: Apple Bowls Exterior
alt: Bottoms of two apple-shaped stoneware bowls with a drippy red-green glaze. One has initials "r.s." in the foot well, while the other sports a carved cursive "redding" as its makers' mark.

title: Mug 1
alt: A small stoneware mug with a red-green glaze and a pinched square hand-built handle.

title: Mug 2
alt: A medium-sized stoneware mug with a drippy red-black glaze and a rustic appearance.

title: Mug 3
alt: A small stoneware mug with a drippy red-black glaze and a rustic appearance. Some small drips of glaze run to the bottom of the foot.

title: Mug 4
alt: A large green stoneware teacup with a playful handle and a white interior.
